s2.title: Migration Archive
s2.p: For migration information to &XercesCName; 2.2.0 or earlier, please refer to Migration Archive.

s2.title: Migrating from &XercesCName; 2.2.0 to &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;
s2.p: The following section is a discussion of the technical differences between &XercesCName; 2.2.0 code base and the &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;.

s3.title: Public API Changes

ul.li: To support additional DOM L3 functions, the following are added:
DOMDocument canSetNormalizationFeature, setNormalizationFeature, getNormalizationFeature, getErrorHandler, setErrorHandler removed
